property.name: text
property.value: DE director stopWhenQueueIsEmpty false synchronizeToRealTime true

property.name: text
property.value: POST /room/markers Calculates and returns illumination at the sensor

property.name: text
property.value:
See also: SmartRoom demo Scale: One pixel = 1 centimeter (Room would be roughly 15 x 15 feet, 225 sq ft)
Equation: Luminous intensity on a spherical surface I = (3P) / (4*pi*r^2) where P is power in watts or lumens = Lumens per meter squared

property.name: text
property.value: TODO: Should lightIsOn and thresholds be initialized for every GET request (e.g. page refresh?)

property.name: text
property.value:
This model launches a web server and provides a service available at http://localhost:8079/room
This model provides a web service for configuring a light and a sensor in a room. The sensor will turn the light on and off according to user-defined thresholds. Thrashing (repeated on/off light behavior) may occur depending on the thresholds and the proximity of the light to the sensor. Drag light or sensor to change proximity.
Please run the model and navigate to that URL (or run the model and double click on this comment).

property.name: text
property.value: GET /room request Returns main page; Initial light status is off Generates GET to /room/light and then POST to /room/markers Click on this annotation to view http://localhost:8078/room

property.name: text
property.value: GET /room/light Returns light status and light amount Request is cached until a light status change occurs ("long polling") (See SensorAndrew demo) Click on this annotation to go to http://localhost:8078/room/light

property.name: text
property.value: Port number and link for header comment Force evaluation on model start

property.name: text
property.value: Assume only one light, one sensor for now

entity.name: IterateOverArray
entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!
Convert string x, y coordinates to doubles ExpressionToToken, ExpressionToToken2 output ports set to double (Right click -> Customize -> Ports)

entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!
Convert string x, y coordinates to doubles ExpressionToToken, ExpressionToToken2 output ports set to double (Right click -> Customize -> Ports)

entity.name: FileReader
entity.doc: Read an entire file and output as a string

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value
